channel.title: MSCP Rap (looking for some dope ass niggers to rap)
channel.description:
Serious thread, post improvements. EDIT: Im now looking for a couple of dope ass niggers to rap this, you can pick your part.
"Trollin" (feat. Exion & ChaosPkers) [Chorus] They see me postin They hatin Moderatin they tryin to catch me postin dirty Tryin to catch me postin dirty Tryin to catch me postin dirty Tryin to catch me postin dirty Tryin to catch me postin dirty My spammin so tense I'm a pedo bear Archer hopin that he gon catch me postin dirty Tryin to catch me postin dirty Tryin to catch me postin dirty Tryin to catch me postin dirty Tryin to catch me postin dirty [Verse 1 - Pure2Sexy] Mods think they can see me lean I'm black so it ain't easy to be seen When you see me troll by they can see the glean And my shine on the deck and the PC screen Troll with a new prick, he like hold up Next to the playstation controller is a modem and my keyboarda Turn a Evil_ into a coma krackkid you ain't know, I'm crazy like Krayzie AMERIKA` Just tryin to spam ain't tryin to have no mutes Rock clean itself so I pull in flamin Laws of moderatin you know they hate me Spammin turned all the way up until the maximum I can speak for some ten year olds tryin to spam for some But we packin somethin that we have and um will have a ten year old locked up in the maximum Security cell, I'm grippin mutes Music loud and spammin slow Trollin and postin like hit this dough Pull up from behind and is in his modem Linux down gotta stop pollution CDs change niggas like who is that producing? This the Mute-N-Flame when we out and cruisin Got warrants in every site except MITB but I still ain't bein muted [Chorus] [Verse 2 - Exion] NIGGAH IM FRUM MOPAR DEY GOT 11 YEER OLDS AND FR33 DELTA SERBAS I been leechin and wankin holdin a vps cause a brother can't focus I gotta get to home 'fore the po po's scope this big ol Excursion swerving all up in the curve man Nigga been trollin on that google and the gin again is in again we in the wind Doin a hundred while I puff on the delta And rollin another one up, we livin like we ain't givin a anti-leech I got a hard drive in my right hand, kihomura on my lap freezing my balls Roll a nigga tree, green leaves and all Trollin pretty deep, me and my Kayy-Ohh I gotta get back to black markets Wanted by the six pound and I got heat glock glock shots to the block we creep creep Pop Pop hope mods don't see me, on a low key With no regards for the rules we dodge em like flame em all But I won't get iped up and banned up on charges for none of y'all Keep a deltaskup in car, and some RAM to spark, but well if you want, mitb you poppin dark Ready or not we bust trollz off in the air Exion, Pure2Sexy & ChaosPkers [Chorus] [Verse 3 - ChaosPkers] Do what you thinkin so, I tried to let you go Turn up a RAM of light and I swang it slower A mod upset for sure cause they think they know that they catchin me with plenty of the troll and flo So they get behind me flamin to check my tags, look at my rearview and they mutin Thinkin they'll catch me on the wrong well keep tryin Cause they denyin is false reportin MITB, TRX you can check my tags Pull me over try to check my silab CoonRaper compartment gotta get my cash Cause the crooked flamerz try to come up fast And been a flamer that I am I talk to them, giving a damn bout not feeling my moderation When they realize I ain't even postin dirty bet you'll be leavin with an even madder mood I'mma laugh at you then I'mma have to cruise I'm in number one on some more DJ The Soul You can't ban me plus you can't mute This a message to the rules tellin them WE HATE YOU I can't be muted or tell 'em that they shoulda known Trollin' down, chokin' crooked on my chrome Bookmarkin' MSCP, tryin' to find a chick I wanna bone Carly Like they couldn't stop me I'mma 'bout to troll up at your home and it's on [Chorus 2x] NIGGAH IM FRUM MOPAR DEY GOT 11 YEER OLDS AND FR33 DELTA SERBAS!
Credits to everybody i mentioned and me. Extra credits to JabaFiar cause i typed this at 1am and he added some shit on.

item.title: MSCP Rap (looking for some dope ass niggers to rap)
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:63, topic:351898”][quote author=Nexus_ link=topic=448253.msg3291199#msg3291199 date=1280595021]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=448253.msg3291178#msg3291178 date=1280592786]

[quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=448253.msg3291079#msg3291079 date=1280582410]

holy shit… kids will be kids
[/quote]It’s to get the community involved in something other then spamming / trolling.
[/quote]What do you consider spam?..

I don’t know about him, but I consider spam:

omG first p0st pl0xxxxxxxx

OR

dammmmm disssss is goodd lolololololol :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: :rolleyes: ;D ;D ;D ;D (lewk’)

That. Even though I love lewk’, he is top spamzor.
[/quote]It was a rhetorical question, obviously no one here is capable of understanding such things…[/quote]
How is that obvious?.. So, let me get this straight: if I said:

What is your favorite color?..

Thats rhetorical? I dun fink so. :\ (not trying to start a flame war)

Read full topic

item.title: MSCP Rap (looking for some dope ass niggers to rap)
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:32, topic:351898”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=448253.msg3290139#msg3290139 date=1280503968]

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=448253.msg3289841#msg328984
date=1280465889]

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=448253.msg3289819#msg3289819
date=1280463580]
[quote author=Newty link=topic=448253.msg3289815#msg3289815
date=1280463409]

i give up on this site

Agreed.

I can’t believe you guys would waste your time doing something so fucking invaluable.

Kinda like the post you just made, or the post I’m making here to bring attention to your post?

Time wasted was minniscule in comparison.

Could have saved time just saying “Time wasted was small in comparison”, instead of trying to sound smart. No need for the stupid words, when smaller ones work fine, and have the same meaning.

I’m not trying to sound smart… That is how I thought the sentence up so that is what I put down. Apparently not all of us can think at the same lower intellectual level as you and I apologize for that.
[/quote]hahaha fucking pathetic loser. l2havfun.
[/quote]

Learn to not follow internet meme’s like ‘l2’, it makes you look like a fucking queer. Also, change your signature, I don’t care if it’s a joke or not, that is asking for a rep reset.
[/quote]nooooo! not my precious rep hahahaha seriously your fucking sad newty go kill yourself loser. and seriously you act like those wannabe cool kids tryin to be different like… amfg dunt use meme’s they is for luzers like u!!$#… fuck off
[/quote]

I could care less what 95% of you think. There is a handful on this site that even have opinions worth hearing, and yours isn’t one of them. I’m only hear to do a little bit of moderating and to have discussions occasionaly. However, when they turn to flame like this it is just time to step away from the conversation. So you win, good job![/quote]

This whole conversation is a complete waste of time IMO.

Read full topic
